flawed_nl_solution:
If Calvin had scored 500 points and Paislee 3/4 times as many points as Calvin, Paislee had scored 3/4*500=2000/3 points.
To have a chance of tying the game, Paislee had to score 500-2000/3=<<500-2000/3=-500/3>>-500/3 points

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 375, not 2000/3. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
